title: Love Catcher
overview: A romantic reality show where ten men and women of different professions and ages will seek their love for eight days of cohabitation. Unlike other similar shows, this has an unusual rule. In addition to the" love catchers", the show also has" money catchers " who can get a prize of 50 million won (about $44830). The show needs to develop their relationship, while avoiding the "fishers of money." Also in the Studio will be six observers, who together with the audience will try to guess who is who.
